blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Ifdnp never ever were together(which is 99%likely)dont ou think all they did in 09-10was really bad and likenot homophobe...
question: Ifdnp never ever were together(which is 99%likely)dont ou think all they did in 09-10was really bad and likenot homophobe butthey were big dumb, immature and ignorant n stuff?I get that boys always jokes about being gay and things like that but they were next level prankster and its soooo bad(not like they were the only one thought(i saw their "friends"doing the same things(ucanseeonthewaybackmachine) and others being all like "*name*is my boyfriend haha<3")just to joke on their shippers
answer: The short answer is that I don’t think we can fairly judge comments made ten years ago by today’s standards and without context. Since this is a discussion blog, I’ll give you a long answer. First of all, we do need to acknowledge the fact that even if Dan and Phil aren’t and never were dating, we still don’t know their sexualities now or what they considered their sexualities to be at the time. We don’t know if they were joking around, experimenting, or being completely serious, and those things aren’t for us to know. We don’t know about the inside jokes they had with their friends at the time and how those arose. Some of the comments are completely vague and Dan has said in the past that he saw shippers taking a quote he shared, speaking about his ex-girlfriend (people seem to forget or not know that Dan had a girlfriend for a large part of 2009), and passing it around as a phan thing. This really gets to the crux of the problem, which is that those comments weren’t meant for our us. The only reason we see them today, ten years removed, is because people have selected the comments they wanted to save in order to build a narrative, which are but a snapshot, and applied meaning to them, not even necessarily the right meaning. The phandom, particularly when it comes to shipping, seems to think that everything Dan and Phil do or have done is for our consumption and with us in mind, but that’s a fallacy. The majority of the time Dan and Phil are just living their lives and learning and growing and figuring things out like any other person and, if we respect them, we should give them the space to do that without constantly pulling stuff up from the past and judging them for it, in my opinion.

title: Chill out guys
body:
What I’m going to say probably what some of you have realised for a long time, but I’m sure some of you doesn’t. Some may have already said it but I just feel an urge to say this after I have seen various posts in the phandom. I’m just a nobody in the phandom because I didn’t really contributed to it much so I would either get hate or maybe ignored which is more likely. I’m gonna say it anyways;)

I feel like some fans are just too attached to Dan. So many people are saying that they are sad because Dan referred us, the phandom, as his ‘friend’ but this hiatus is just making them feel like a friend have just abandoned them. Ok first, I don’t think he has emphasised that we are his ‘friends’, but more as his audience. I just think that some of you may have overly interpreted this word. I’m not denying the possibilities that he might consider us as friends, but the thing is people have taken it too far, say, do you reckon him as a hi-bye friend that you casually notice his updates in life, or the type of friend that you can call him at 3am to talk about your crush? This sounds ridiculous but the latter is what i feel like some of the fans has imagined how their relationship with Dan are like. If you have put too much expectations at the very beginning when you joined the phandom, time for you to adjust it mate! Totally not hating on the ones who care about his life, because so do I! But I guess we are just not on the same page yet. 

I know everybody is feeling sad, we all missed him, we all want him to come back; but you guys are just taking this too seriously. I know dnp may have meant a lot to you but pressuring him to report everything about his life is just too much for both of you, as it is exhausting for him but you can’t stop your curiosity on wanting to know more and more about him. I know it is easier said than done, but be a bit more relaxed is what the phandom needs right now.

Ps excuse me for my shitty English I hope y’all understand what I meant:)
